description: Experienced Software Engineer, Software Project Manager and Quality Assurance Engineer with a background in software development and testing using agile methodologies. Skilled in project management, team leadership, and software testing. Strong analytical and practical skills with excellent interdisciplinary problem-solving abilities. Currently seeking new opportunities to apply my expertise and continue growing professionally.
detailOrQuote: I am the unstoppable force, driven by unwavering self-belief and fueled by curiosity, persistently transforming challenges into stepping stones towards achieving greatness.
